Interface AdminUsersAdapter.OnUserActionListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
AdminProfilesFragment
Enclosing class:
AdminUsersAdapter
public static interface AdminUsersAdapter.OnUserActionListener
Interface for handling user action callbacks.

Implementing classes can respond to user deletion and viewing actions initiated from the adapter's list items.

Since:
2025-11-01
Version:
1.0
Author:
Dinma (Team Quartz)

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    onDeleteClick(User user)
    Called when the delete action is triggered for a user.
    void
    onUserClick(User user)
    Called when a user item is clicked to view details.

  • Method Details

    • onDeleteClick

      void onDeleteClick(User user)
      Called when the delete action is triggered for a user.
      Parameters:
      user - The user object to be deleted

    • onUserClick

      void onUserClick(User user)
      Called when a user item is clicked to view details.
      Parameters:
      user - The user object whose details should be displayed
